DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare safety efficacy azithromycin ophthalmic solution , 1 % versus placebo two-week treatment period .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Azithromycin Ophthalmic Solution , 1 % Versus Placebo Subjects With Blepharitis During Two-Week Treatment Period
DOC.criteria: Have best correct visual acuity eye least +0.7 good If female , nonpregnant nonlactating Have current diagnosis blepharitis one eye Have lid structural abnormality Have suspect ocular fungal viral infection Have practice warm compress therapy within 14 day prior Visit 2 Unable withhold use contact lenses treatment followup period Unable withhold use ocular cosmetic product within 24 hour prior study visit Have penetrate intraocular surgery within 90 day prior Visit 2 Have ocular surface surgery within past year prior Visit 2 Have serious medical condition could confound study assessment
